name: frida-agent-example
description: Example Frida agent written in TypeScript

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch agent/ -e 'c,h' -x "npm run c" & frida-compile agent/index.ts -o _agent.js -w
scripts.c: for i in "agent"/*".c"; do [ -f $i ] && ((echo 'const code = `' && cat $i &&  echo -e "\`;\nexport default code") > $i.js) || echo "No .c files to convert"; done
